characters.story: See how the shellfish forms redeem? It asks "Shoo? Atone?" curiously!
Picture daylight taking form - it shouts "Joh!" with vivid energy!
Like water, this character means tianjin and sings "Jin!" like ripples spreading across a pond!
The strokes unite to show smidgen, asking "Lee? Tiny?" curiously!
"May, how many items?" The tree questioned the taskmaster curiously - small objects, a classifier!
This character represents herd, shouting "Moo!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
Picture rose taking form - it asks "May? Flower?" with vivid energy!
Picture candid taking form - it sings "Dwun!" with vivid energy!
A striking symbol for promise that shouts "Nwoh!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
A striking symbol for meaning that shouts "Way!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show inquire, asking "Shyoon? Ask?" curiously!
This character represents penalize, asking "Fah? Fine?" curiously!
The nail takes the shape of place an order, shouting "Ding!" sharply!
Picture chant taking form - it sings "Yohng" with vivid energy!
See how the tree forms espionage? It asks "Dyeh, is that a spy?" curiously!
The strokes unite to show annotate, shouting "Joo!" sharply!
"Lyahng!" Words about roof beam commanded sharply - forgiveness, excuse and pardon!
